Package com.jsacristan.word_card_back.maps

Interface UserMapper

public interface UserMapper
Mapper interface for converting between User entities and DTOs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    userDtoToUser(UserDto userDto)
    Convert a UserDto to a User entity.
    UserDto
    userToUserDto(User user)
    Convert a User entity to a UserDto.

  • Method Details

    • userToUserDto

      UserDto userToUserDto(User user)
      Convert a User entity to a UserDto. This method maps the attributes of a User entity to a UserDto object.
      Parameters:
      user - the User entity to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding UserDto

    • userDtoToUser

      User userDtoToUser(UserDto userDto)
      Convert a UserDto to a User entity. This method maps the attributes of a UserDto to a User entity object.
      Parameters:
      userDto - the UserDto to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding User entity
